item.title: Working with dates and time functions
item.description: Working with dates and time functions Examples of date/time functions in Julia. Preliminaries Load the required packages (if not installed or not updated), it is not necessary to execute every time. #In using Pkg Pkg.add("Dates") #Out [32m[1m Resolving[22m[39m package versions... [32m[1m Updating[22m[39m `C:\Users\Hadir Castro\.julia\environments\v1.0\Project.toml` [90m [no changes][39m [32m[1m Updating[22m[39m `C:\Users\Hadir Castro\.julia\environments\v1.0\Manifest.toml` [90m [no changes][39m Call the ‘Dates’ package. #In using Dates now() function A simple function that returns the just now time in 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.
